definition: to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: Take action now to avoid that possibility later.
sentences.chinese: 現在就開始採取行動吧，省得日後追悔莫及。

sentences.english: The bread comes already sliced so that the housewife need not exert herself to slice it.
sentences.chinese: 買回來的麪包已經切好片，主婦就省得再切。

sentences.english: Let me remind you once again so that you won't forget.
sentences.chinese: 我再說一遍，省得你忘了。

sentences.english: I'm going to run right back to the pond so I won't miss her.
sentences.chinese: 那我得趕緊回水池去，省得和她錯過。

sentences.english: Hmauhnti just a code stealer and clown, he cant make code himself.
sentences.chinese: 看來以後做代碼都要加密了，省得那些小偷來偷密碼。

sentences.english: I'll come early tomorrow in order to save your waiting.
sentences.chinese: 明天我會早來點兒，省得讓你等着。

sentences.english: Your coming relives me of the bother of writing a long letter.
sentences.chinese: 你來了省得我去麻煩寫一封長信。

sentences.english: That's OK anyway, I love playing the happy cesspool.
sentences.chinese: 這樣也好，省得我在愛情的幸福中沉淪。

sentences.english: A stitch in time saves nines.
sentences.chinese: 及時一針省得過後九針。

sentences.english: Province last officer the moon aspire from Gao more troublesome.
sentences.chinese: 省得上官月兒自高奮勇的更麻煩。

sentences.english: Will you do the shopping for me? It'll save me a trip.
sentences.chinese: 替我買點東西好嗎？這樣省得我走一趟了。

sentences.english: A wise wife never gives her husband time to have second thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 聰明的老婆從不給老公有時間三思，省得節外生枝。

sentences.english: Would you please? That would save me a trip.
sentences.chinese: 勞駕好嗎？這樣我就省得再跑一趟了。

sentences.english: Your coming relieves me of the bother of writing a long letter.
sentences.chinese: 你來了省得我去麻煩寫一封長信了。

definition: so as not to/so as to avoid
thus/in this way/like this
(coll.) to be eager for/to long for/to look forward to
(coll.) some day/one of these days
in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
not worthwhile
you might as well (do it)/simply/just
(dialect) oneself/by oneself
(dialect) very
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
see 犯不著|犯不着[fan4 bu5 zhao2]
no matter (who, what etc)
to cause or lead to sth bad
to be in the way/to be a hindrance
there is no need/why should
no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
otherwise/or else/or
